repnme.cdata!:
Lao People's Democratic Republic -
            Second Education Development Project

abstracts.cdata!:
Ratings for the Second Education
            Development Project for Lao People's Democratic
            Republic were as follows: outcomes were moderately
            satisfactory, risk to development outcome was moderate, Bank
            performance was satisfactory, and Borrower performance was
            satisfactory. Some lessons learned included:
            decentralization of school construction to remote rural
            communities increases ownership and commitment to education.
            Mainstreaming implementation within government agencies
            requires ongoing capacity building. Strong financial
            management systems are critical for ensuring the efficient
            use and accounting of resources.

docna.cdata!:
Lao People's Democratic Republic -
            Second Education Development Project

display_title.display_title:
Lao People's Democratic
            Republic - Second Education Development Project

repnme.cdata!:
Lao People's Democratic Republic -
            Second Education Development Project : restructuring

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Second Education
            Development Project for Lao Peoples Democratic Republic is
            to assist in achieving primary education and completion in
            the nineteen poorest districts of the six poor provinces;
            improving quality; and strengthening capacities to develop
            policies and strategies to monitor and manage primary
            education. No changes are made to the project development
            objective (PDO); components; performance indicators, results
            framework, safeguards classification; institutional
            arrangements; financial management or procurement; and no
            outstanding legal covenants or audit reports.

display_title.display_title:
Lao People's Democratic
            Republic - Second Education Development Project :
            restructuring : Main report
